text: An action to recognize a foreign-country judgment must be commenced within the earlier of the time during which the foreign-country judgment is effective in the foreign country or 15 years from the date that the foreign-country judgment became effective in the foreign country.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 19-86, see notes under ยง 15-361.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 9 of the Uniform Foreign-Country Money Judgments Recognition Act. See Vol. 13, Part II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 15-369

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Judgments and Executions; Fees and Costs. (Refs & Annos)
